main event: An unidentified object was observed blinking on and off, appearing to be the size of a four-engine aircraft but lacking tail or wings, observed for nearly minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported as old and noted to have silver and pink colors,It was classified as probably an aircraft due to air traffic at the time,The sighting included both ground visual and radar observations,The exact number of confirmed witnesses is unclear but includes military and civilian sources,The report lacks sufficient data for a definite conclusion.
sighted object: one blinking light in the sky
